text: Greater Montreal () is the most populous metropolitan area in Quebec and the second most populous in Canada after the Greater Toronto metropolitan area. It includes the city of Montreal, the rest of the municipalities on the Island of Montreal that are not part of the city of Montreal, the cities of Laval, Longueuil, Terrebonne, Brossard and Repentigny. Category:Montreal Category:Settlements in Quebec Category:Metropolitan areas
title: Greater Montreal
